description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Hosting Pay with Vipps and MobilePay for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Pay with Vipps and MobilePay for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.14.13.

product.name: Pay with Vipps and MobilePay for WooCommerce
Pay with Vipps and MobilePay for WooCommerce
